Text.Page:
This region is only now beginning to come to life after the Day of Fire. Many creatures are nearly out of danger of extinction.

Unfortunately, that is not the case for the struthios. There are too few of them, and too many hyenas. Perhaps would care to redress the balance in favor of the struthios?

You'll find them southwest of here. And be forewarnedâ€”they're every bit as deadly as the hyenas who hunt them.
We appreciate <PCNAME>'s actions on behalf of nature's balance.
